description: This file defines a React custom hook called useAsync, which provides a standardized way to handle asynchronous operations with loading, success, and error states. It manages async call lifecycle, state updates, and cleanup to prevent state setting after unmount.

methods.name: useAsync(asyncFn, deps = [], options = {})
methods.description: A custom React hook that manages the lifecycle of an asynchronous function, providing status, value, error, and a run method for execution.
